description: Stores the revision history of the procedures stored on a dental visit. The order in which the procedures are saved is the order procedures are sequenced.

columns.name: REGIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the pt order group record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.
